channel.title: SwiftBar Releases
channel.description: Most recent SwiftBar releases (not test builds).

item.title: SwiftBar 1.4.0
item.description:
New Added support for macOS Monterey

New Automate SwiftBar with Shortcuts

New Plugin specific Cache and Data directories

New Russian Localization

New Support for unlimited shell parameters

New Plugin Repository Categories are now localized

New Support for `shell` parameter alongside with `bash`

New Option to set shell of choice to bash or zsh

New `sfsize` parameter to customize SF Symbol size within text independently of font size

Fixed Narrower minimum width for Repository Browser window

Fixed SF Symbol should honor the font size parameter

Fixed Menubar opens on MouseDown event

Fixed `author.github` not parsed in plugin metadata

Fixed `swiftbar.environment` not available as environment variable

Fixed Menu bar item with image and text missing padding
